text: The 2019–20 season was a debut season in the top Ukrainian football league for Kolos Kovalivka. Kolos competed in Premier League and Ukrainian Cup. After winning play-off matches in Premier League Kolos qualified for European club tournament for the next season for the first time in clubs history. ==Players== ===Squad information===
